Categories: Artificial Intelligence, Cryptocurrency, Digital Media, Intelligent Systems, Machine Learning, Mobile Payments, Natural Language Processing, Social Impact, Social Media, Social Network, Virtual Assistant
Description: The first proactive AI assistant that sits at the epicentre of AI and daily life
Full Description: Other Mind is the first proactive AI assistant that sits at the epicentre of AI and daily life. It uses proprietary learning models designed and developed by some of the industry’s leading data scientists, to disrupt how technology supports daily life. Other Mind is creating a new and innovative kind of Artificial Intelligence (AI) based assistant that actively listens and learns the things you do, before proactively taking care of them for you. In addition it is innovating new and intuitive ways to connect you with the world, while aggregating the majority of features and functionalities seen in other social media, chat, and currency transfer applications. Our world is getting flatter and the number of apps and feeds you need to manage to keep up with society, is becoming overwhelming to say the least. Founded in Los Angeles, CA in 2017, Other Mind is designed to free users from the constant focus on digital devices, using the full capabilities of AI and machine learning to execute mundane tasks while keeping the user engaged. It is changing how people leverage technology and is giving users back time, freedom and independence from the struggle of maintaining an ever-growing digital presence, while staying completely connected.  Other Mind is an alternative technology company that is 100% subscription-based and does not rely on third party data monetization or other forms of advertising or data-mining tools. Because of this, each user can be assured that their information and data will never leave the platform and will only be used to the benefit of each user independently.

Description: Overland Storage provides data protection appliances for midrange and distributed enterprises.
Full Description: Overland Storage, Inc. is a global provider of data management and data protection solutions across the data lifecycle.  Overland offers an range of integrated technologies and services for primary, nearline, offline, archival and cloud data storage that allow users to manage different tiers of information over time. Whether distributed data is across the hall or across the globe, Overland's vision is to enable companies to focus on building their business instead of worrying about data growth. Overland offers the SnapServerÂ® line of network attached storage (NAS) and storage area network (SAN) solutions designed for primary and secondary data storage; the REOÂ® series of products, which provide disk-based data protection, continuous local backup and remote disaster recovery; and the NEOÂ® series of tape backup and archive systems, which are designed to meet long-term data archiving and regulatory compliance requirements. The company also offers data management and data protection software. Overland's solutions are used in various industry sectors, including financial services, video surveillance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, telecommunications, broadcasting, and research and development. Overland Storage markets its products through value-added resellers, direct market resellers, distributors, original equipment manufacturers, and sells to small and midsize businesses, enterprises, multinational corporations, governmental organizations, and educational institutions. The company was formerly known as Overland Data, Inc. and changed its name to Overland Storage, Inc. in 2002. Overland Storage was founded in 1980 and has offices in San Diego, California and San Jose, California.

Description: OCI Partners LP owns and operates an integrated methanol and ammonia production facility.
Full Description: OCI Partners LP owns and operates an integrated methanol and ammonia production facility that is strategically located on the Texas Gulf Coast near Beaumont. The Company is a methanol producer in the United States with an annual methanol production capacity of approximately 730,000 metric tons and an annual ammonia production capacity of approximately 265,000 metric tons, and it is in the early stages of a debottlenecking project that increases its annual methanol production capacity by 25% to approximately 912,500 metric tons and its annual ammonia production capacity by 15% to approximately 305,000 metric tons. In December 2013, the Company acquired a 20,000 metric ton ammonia tank from Lucite International for additional ammonia storage capacity on-site at Beaumont, Texas

Categories: CRM, E-Commerce, E-Commerce Platforms, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Point of Sale, Retail, Retail Technology, SaaS, Unified Communications
Description: OrderStorm is a SaaS company that provides CRM and order management solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises.
Full Description: OrderStorm's unified commerce platform addresses the "Amazon Threat" for over 1.5M retailers and their suppliers. Like Quickbooks simplified finance and became the de facto accounting product across SMBs, OrderStorm aims to be the one application retailers rely on to deliver an elite customer lifetime experience. Like an affordable, easy to use Netsuite for small business, OrderStorm is made up of a number of business-critical modules including: •	Custom Order Management	 •	Service Center Operations	 •	Rental Mgmt	 •	Delivery Mgmt	 •	Customer Self-Service & Notifications	 •	Workforce Mgmt •	Inventory  •	Store-to-Store Transfer  •      POS  •      Custom Product Configurators  •	Shopping cart  •	CRM  •      and more... Retail is a highly fragmented industry. Our strategy is not to provide a one-sized-fits-all solution to a broad market, but instead use our platform to craft solutions that appear to be custom tailored for each specific niche.  To prove the strategy, we focused our initial GTM on the 15,000 badly underserved independent hardware stores in the US (ACE, TrueValue, Hardware Hank, etc...). With one junior sales rep we closed 157 stores in our first 15 months, and became the fastest growing software in ACE hardware's history.  In this niche, we aren't replacing other software, we're replacing manual processes and paper. Our impact is significant and immediate - most store owners get their payback in a few days. We typically improve customer satisfaction by more 30% and operational efficiency by over 34% in the first few months. The result: we significantly decrease customer, staff, and management frustration while increasing profitability.

Description: Simple and intuitive guidance solution that allows you to follow easily an itinerary, without the need of a screen or a map.
Full Description: onTracks is a guiding device composed of two bracelets and a mobile application enabling outdoor sports enthusiasts (runners, mountain bikers, hikers ...) to fully enjoy new routes to discover without having to consult a map or a GPS. Once the route has been selected, and the activity started, the bracelets vibrate to indicate when to turn left, or right.  The application shares thousands of routes and can suggest its own to the community. With onTracks, the pleasure of discovery is total, and the risk of getting lost disappears. So, only the pleasure of letting oneself wander on new traces prevails! This new "intuitive" connected guidance solution opens up new horizons to the practice of outdoor sports, the use of two-wheeled vehicles in urban environment, and the discovery of sightseeing tours. Patented. Market is... BIG. Our startup onTracks will attend the CES next January, and we will be pleased to invite you at our booth # 51656 at Eureka Park.
